count: How many Nintendo staff members reported complaints about the control scheme?
How many users were surveyed about the control scheme?
How many button presses did the new item system require?
How many minutes before release did the team rework Link's character model?
How many sections are in the player's guide?
yesno: 1. Did Nintendo staff members report that demo users complained about the difficulty of the control scheme?
2. Did Aonuma realize that his team had implemented Wii controls under the mindset of "forcing" users to adapt, instead of making the system intuitive and easy to use?
3. Did the camera movement get reworked and item controls get changed to avoid accidental button presses?
4. Did the new item system require use of the button that had previously been used for the sword?
5. Did Link's character model get changed so that he was right-handed?
